nuwaraeliya,maskeliya,ginigathhena,kothmale,walapane,nawathispane,kotagala,aagarapathana,mathurata,ragala,bagawanthalawa,hanguranketha yana pradeshawala 56% k jiwathwanane wathuprajawayi.me atharin wayasa awurudu 18 ta wadi wathukamkaruwangen 60 % th 70% th athara sankhyawak mathpan panayata yomuwa thibena bawa mathpan ha mathdrawyaya pilibada thorathuru madhyasthana wartha penwadeyi.ehi sandahan daththa anuwa jathika washayen mema agaya dakwenne 37 % k pamanawu mattamakaya.wathukaraya thula pawathnawu math lolkama wisin nuwaraeliya merata wadima mathpan panayak siduwana disthrikka athara thewani thanata osawa thabannata samathwi thibena athara eeta wathukaraye atham deshapalakayinda udagedidima wathujanathawage awasanawaki.
